title: Resilience of Mega-Satellite Constellations: How Node Failures Impact Inter-Satellite Networking Over Time?
summary: This study investigates the impact of satellite node failures on inter-satellite networking over time in mega-satellite constellations, which involves both spatial (constellations) and temporal (over time) aspects.
usefulness_reason: The title explicitly mentions 'Over Time' and 'Mega-Satellite Constellations', indicating both temporal and spatial aspects of the research.
